New Records: Anthony Edwards played his 69th career 30-point game, tying Lakers star Anthony Davis for 15th all time for players 23 years old and below.
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored 13 points in the fourth quarter to extend their lead from a single point to 17 in only five minutes.
Pre-Game Insights: Rudy Gobert praised Anthony Edwards' steady improvement.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards expressed his desire to avoid being a team that doesn't consistently make the playoffs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article mentions that the Timberwolves traded Karl-Anthony Towns for complementary players in the offseason, signaling that Anthony Edwards now holds the keys to the team.
Others: The article mentions that the Timberwolves currently have a 5-3 record and remain one of the league's few title contenders.
